actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain that recipients of veterans' pension will not have the amount of such pension reduced because of certain increases in monthly social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that recipients of veterans' pensions will not have the amount of such pension reduced because of increases in monthly social security benefits under Public Law 92-336.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to make certain that recipients of veterans' pension will not have the amount of such pension reduced because of certain increases in monthly social security benefits.
